solution.text:
Given points are : P=(_{i}_,_{j}_), Q=(_{k}_,_{l}_) and R(x , y).
It is given that these points forms a equilateral triangle.
Thus distance between all three points should be equal.
Therefore,
Equating distance PR and QR.
i.e., PR = QR
So, \(PR^2 = QR^2\)
i.e.,\((_{i}_-x)^2 + (_{j}_-y)^2\) = \((_{k}_-x)^2 + (_{l}_-y)^2\)
i.e.,\((_{i}_^2+x^2-_{{2*i}}_x)+(_{j}_^2+y^2-_{{2*j}}_y)\)=\((_{k}_^2+x^2-_{{2*k}}_x)+(_{l}_^2+y^2-_{{2*l}}_y)\)
\(_{{pow(i,2)}}_+x^2-_{{2*i}}_x+_{{pow(j,2)}}_+y^2-_{{2*j}}_y = _{{pow(k,2)}}_+x^2-_{{2*k}}_x+_{{pow(j,2)}}_+y^2-_{{2*l}}_y\)
_{{pow(i,2)}}_ + _{{pow(j,2)}}_ - _{{pow(k,2)}}_ - _{{pow(l,2)}}_ = _{{2*i}}_x + _{{2*j}}_y - _{{2*k}}_x - _{{2*l}}_y
_{{pow(i,2)+pow(j,2)-pow(k,2)-pow(l,2)}}_ = _{{2*i-k*2}}_x + _{{2*j-2*l}}_y
_{{2*i-k*2}}_x + _{{2*j-2*l}}_y = _{{pow(i,2)+pow(j,2)-pow(k,2)-pow(l,2)}}_

content.text: Find the linear relation between x and y such that the points (x , y), (_{i}_,_{j}_) and (_{k}_,_{l}_) forms a equilateral triangle.
